preqs: 12 points from level two BIO, BTH, ENV or GEN units and either SCI1020 or STA1010 or STA2010 or permission. Recommended unit: BIO2011

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {BIO2%, BTH2%, ENV2%, GEN2%} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {SCI1020, STA1010, STA2010})
Unit was previously coded {BIO3011%, BOT3011, ZOO3011}
(Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {BIO2%, BTH2%, ENV2%, GEN2%} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {SCI1020, STA1010, STA2010})
Unit was previously coded {BIO3011%, BOT3011, ZOO3011}

description: The philosophy of science. Writing and assessing scientific papers and reports. The analysis and interpretation of biological data, especially the design and analysis of experiments. This unit is a pre-requisite unit for Honours in Biology (BIO4100 and BIO4200).
